transcript.text:
￼














B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan


Store Actions
Configuration

8 min
purpose the configuration tab in the individual stores provides different set of settings to the admin for personalize their store, manage notifications as well as inventory configuration we have given different widgets for these configurations website logos with this widget, the admin can manage the logos for the stores refer to the website logo docid\ j9a2q668vrsrxq3docele for more information theme configuration with this widget, the admin can manage the theme of the stores refer to the theme configuration docid\ lyxerxjypn7qjvor 2l8s for more information email notifications this is a quick link to configure and manage email notifications clicking on this widget will redirect you to the set email notifications page settings we have made it easier for the store customer to use the system with some customizable store settings docid 4tdw sur9b28ckkz1pflb for their front store pages personalization with this widget, the admin can personalize and manage the pages for the stores you can refer to the personalize pages docid hawk8lqamwxawz8nuqjj for more information email template this is a quick link to access and manage email templates for the selected store custom css with this widget, admin can add and manage the custom css docid\ xpevn6cuza5p6u pdznl4 inventory this widget will allow admin to manage and store finished goods until the time of delivery in a more systematic way refer to the manage inventory docid 3p255 jryw0qlnuu8zexg for more information sms notifications this is a quick link to access and manage the sms notifications for the selected store external services setting this is a quick link to access and enable the external services for the selected store only those external services will be displayed that are configured and enabled for the default store here, the store admin can enable or disable the status of the services to be used and displayed for the private store
Did this page help you?
